inscription: Handwritten inscriptions, recto, in pencil: \'The fish should have white eye black line around it. Red bottom; the fish should have black eye white line around it, big fish faint. Unreadable inscription in pencil, verso.
medium: Watercolor with annotations in graphite on cardboard
provenance: Abby Weed Grey, St. Paul; Estate of Mrs. Abby Weed Grey; given to MIA, 1983.
title: Fish and Shells
